text.div:
VRSA (Disorders) (SNOMED)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    404678001 Infection caused by glycopeptide resistant Staphylococcus aureus (disorder)
    404681006 Infection caused by vancomycin resistant Staphylococcus aureus (disorder)
    406577000 Infection caused by vancomycin intermediate/resistant Staphylococcus aureus (disorder)
    406607009 Infection caused by glycopeptide intermediate/resistant Staphylococcus aureus (disorder)
    406615007 Infection caused by vancomycin resistant Staphylococcus aureus, coagulase positive (disorder)
